name: P4: Pinpo-Pon Party Panic
description:
P4: Pinpo-Pon Party Panic is a chaotic competitive local multiplayer table tennis game with multiple playable characters.

Controls:

Move Up/Left- Keyboard W/A/Left/Up or DPAD Up/Left

Move Down/Right- Keyboard S/D/Right/Down or DPAD Down/Right

Confirm- Keyboard Spacebar or Controller A (Xbox)

Dash/Return - Keyboard Shift or Controller B (Xbox) 

Characters:

Poopi-LaLa

Chester Midas

Orchid

BB

KaKa-LaLa

POG

Rose

Papi
